name: Blade-Shift Rage
description:
Blade-Shift Rage is a stylish combo-chasing 2D action platformer, with one hit kills and deaths.


Teleport to dodge attacks, slash and shoot anyone who stands in your way



Play as Blade-Shift Delta, the latest in a new breed of super soldier. With lightning fast reflexes you're able to Blade-Shift to instantaneously teleport.


Use this ability to dodge attacks and dash to overcome platforming challenges. Armed with a sword and revolver you'll need to perform combo kills to reload and chase the highest scores and rankings.


Kill all who oppose you as you rampage through the city to discover who betrayed you and why.


Trust no one, kill them all.
